event:
Act 1: The Birth of Steve Rogers
1942: Hydra’s Attack The film cuts to 1942, in Norway, where Johann Schmidt (Red Skull), leader of the Hydra organization, is in search of the Tesseract.
The film was also released 28 years after the infamous 1986 Howard the Duck film, making Howard’s cameo a cheeky reference.
In 1988, a young Peter Quill is devastated by the death of his mother.

Prologue: Hank Pym’s Past (1989)
We begin in 1989 — Hank Pym, a brilliant scientist and former S.H.I.E.L.D. agent, discovers that S.H.I.E.L.D. leaders, including Howard Stark (Tony Stark’s father) and Peggy Carter, are trying to replicate his discovery — the Pym Particle, a formula that allows objects and people to shrink while increasing their density and strength.

Opening Scene:
• Siberia, 1991:
She’s in Los Angeles in 1995, a time period before the events of the first Avengers film.
Until 1996, after chasing money and power for a thousand years, Wenwu discovered a new ambition.
The movie opens with Tony Stark recalling an incident from New Year's Eve in 1999.
Welcome to Iron Man 2 — released in 2010 and with a lot more studio pressure.
We’re introduced to Thor (2011), directed by Kenneth Branagh.

Present Day: Steve Awakens
Steve’s Resurrection In the year 2011, after being frozen for 70 years in the Arctic, Steve Rogers awakens in a hospital room.

Team 1 – Revisiting the Original Avengers Movie (2012)
This team is tasked with retrieving the Mind Stone (inside the Scepter) and the Space Stone (inside the Tesseract).
They go back to the events of the first Avengers movie in 2012, specifically to the scene where Loki tries to take over New York City.

Team 2 – Thor: The Dark World (2013)
The next team, consisting of Thor and Rocket (from Guardians of the Galaxy), travels to Vormir to retrieve the Reality Stone (Aether) from the events of Thor: The Dark World.

Team 3 – Soul Stone (2014)
The next mission involves Black Widow and Hawkeye, who travel to Vormir to obtain the Soul Stone.
Team 4 – Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)
Finally, Rocket and Groot go to Guardians of the Galaxy's events in 2014 to retrieve the Power Stone from Peter Quill (Star-Lord).
2" (2017) begins with a flashback set in Missouri on Earth in 1980.

Opening Attack on Asgard:
The film opens immediately after the events of Thor: Ragnarok (2017).
Black Panther (2018) is a groundbreaking superhero film from Marvel, directed by Ryan Coogler.
Ant-Man and the Wasp is a 2018 Marvel film that centers around Scott Lang, the Ant-Man, and his team as they go on a mission involving the quantum realm.
